nodes.bodyText: this method have been commented because there is no Executable in junit 4

@achilep please in general do never just comment out methods. If your changes makes something fail you need to understand why that is. If in this case the method is not needed anymore delete it. Please delete the 2 commented methods.
please inline the expectedMessage since we do not need it as a local variable

How can the message be equal to 2 different error messages? I believe this should fail when running the test. Doesnt it?
Remember that expectMessage is checking whether a substring is contained in the message. So instead of is which checks equality it should be containsString I assume
